word: Firmly take your position now. In justice to our churches, we must now decide this matter, and not sell our people into the enemy's hand; for we have a great work to do. I am now instructed to prepare for publication the messages of warning that have been given over and over again for years to keep Dr. Kellogg from following another leader, but the messages have had no influence, after he decided to drive through his own inventions and plans. He is to be pitied, but he has worked, and will continue to work deceptively. We must now determine that every medical institution shall stand in its own individual right. We must leave the poor man in the hands of God, who understands this matter.
